Title: Relates to the delivery of the good faith deposit following award of the bonds to the successful bidder
Summary: Relates to the delivery of the good faith deposit following award of the bonds to the successful bidder; provides that a municipality, school district or district corporation may require that such deposit be made as a condition precedent to the consideration of a bid for the bonds.
LawCode: Amd ยง58.00, Loc Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the local finance law, in relation to the delivery of the good faith deposit following award of the bonds to the successful bidder
